questions.question: What is the FME Server web interface?
options: An application accessed in the browser used to run commands on FME Server.
A command-line program used to run commands on FME Server.
A website hosted on safe.com where users can ask technical questions about FME Server.
A window in FME Workbench used to run commands on FME Server.

questions.question: How can you access the FME Server Web Interface?
options: Type in http://localhost as a URL in a browser window on the machine where FME Server is installed
Type in your hostname/fmeserver as the URL in a browser window (the hostname was specified during the installation)
Through the Windows Start menu under FME Server

questions.question: Which items in the FME Server side menu are only available to FME Server administrators?
options: User Management, System Configuration, Backup & Restore, Projects
User Management, Backup & Restore, Projects, Schedules, Licensing & Engines
User Management, System Configuration, Backup & Restore, Licensing & Engines
User Management, System Configuration, Backup & Restore, Projects, Schedules
